ResourceHeader.ResourceName: Observations of atmospheric minor constituents with millimeter-wave spectroscopic radiometer in Atacama highland, Chile
ResourceHeader.Description: Atmospheric vertical distributions of ozone (O3), chroline oxide (ClO), water vapor isotope (H2-18O) and nitric oxide (NO) in stratosphere and mesosphere retrived from continuous ground-based millimeter-wave (250 GHz) measurements in Atacama highlanda, Chile. Further details of the instrument, data processing and error analysis were described in Mizuno et al. (2002) (doi:10.1023/A:1019618917005) and Kuwahara et al. (2012) (doi:10.5194/amt-5-2601-2012).
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: The millimeter-wave spectroscopic radiometer in Atacama highland is operated by ISEE, Nagoya University, Japan. For data use, please contact the PI (Akira Mizuno at mizuno [at] isee.nagoya-u.ac.jp) for the details. We thank the support staffs of NIPR and ISEE/GRC for their efforts.
